title: User Registration - Email Verification Workflow
description:
Test Objective: Validate the end-to-end user registration flow including email verification to ensure secure account creation.

Test Environment: Staging environment with SMTP email server enabled for testing.

Pre-requisites:

  • SMTP email service is running and accessible
  • Browser cache and cookies cleared
  • Test email address is accessible

Expected Security: Email verification token should expire after 24 hours and be single-use only.

test_steps.expected: Homepage loads with a visible 'Register' link
User is redirected to the registration page

test_steps.action: Enter valid user details (name, email, password) and submit the form
test_steps.expected: Verification email is sent and confirmation message is shown

additional_fields.System.Tags: Registration; Email Verification; User Signup; Security
